ygData.subject: RE: Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: This is no joke, I really love to try this bug. Garren can lent 1.5kpp to me, hehe.
ygData.messageBody:
This is no joke, I really love to try this bug. Garren can lent 1.5kpp to me, hehe.

On Friday, 30 July, 1999 9:09 AM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> hehee... i would like to test out this bug... anyone wanna give me 1500 pp?
> hehee... (joking)....
>
> Nic
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 8:04 AM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Spells
>
>
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> >
> > Just found the 1500PP bug
> >
> > Convert around 1.5kPP coins into copper and drop them onto urself
> >
> > U will still move normally, No penalty to AGI nor fighting skills/speed.
> >
> > and u can keep on piling stuff onto urself.
> >
> > ur weight will go into -19000/110 (that's for me).
> >
> > I've reported this Garren's Money Bug
> >
> > DarkElf wrote:
> >
> > > Hi all, I me a level 20 necro and would like to ask some questions
> > > regarding spells.1. Where can I buy the spell "Animate Undead"? I have
> > > tried my guild and was unable to find it.2. Shadow Vortex, what does
> > > it do?3. Shadow step, how to control the position I want to go? very
> > > lonely ah. Povar like got no Singaporean playing. Decay SinglangDark
> > > Elf Necromancer
> >
> > --
